headline: “She’s Incredibly Smart,” Says Jim Cramer About Williams-Sonoma, Inc. (WSM)’s CEO
summary: We recently published 12 Stocks Jim Cramer Discussed As Part Of His Big Tech Deep Dive. Williams-Sonoma, Inc. (NYSE:WSM) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Cramer has started frequently discussing Williams-Sonoma, Inc. (NYSE:WSM) lately. The shares have gained 8% year-to-date despite somewhat of a slump in the retail and home building industries. […]
